Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 1
Description.Text: Discover exceptional event menus expertly prepared and designed to inspire.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 2
Description.Text: Our luxury hotel near the Washington, D.C., Convention Center offers customizable event options.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 3
Description.Text: Our modern downtown meeting venues offer 64,000 square feet of space, including two ballrooms.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 4
Description.Text: Our spaces are ideal for your next meeting and easily booked with QuickGroup.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 5
Description.Text: Count on our advanced facilities and expert meeting professionals to deliver a great event.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 6
Description.Text: Our Washington, D.C., Convention Center hotel's meeting rooms offer wireless Internet.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 1
Description.Text: Click here to learn more about our services and wedding venues in Washington, DC.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 2
Description.Text: It is easy to host corporate galas and fundraisers in our 19,032-square-foot Grand Ballroom.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 3
Description.Text: Looking to host a small event or gathering - book rooms quickly and easily with QuickGroup.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 4
Description.Text: Our Washington, DC wedding venues offer a creative team of catering and event professionals.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 5
Description.Text: Outdoor event space includes our plaza and an 11th floor Outdoor Terrace overlooking Washington, DC.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 6
Description.Text: Pamper yourself and enjoy the ultimate relaxation at our on-site spa before your special day.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 1
Description.Text: This trendy hotel in Washington, DC is located steps from the Convention Center and CityCenter DC in Penn Quarter.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 2
Description.Text: The luxurious Vida Fitness Center and Aura Spa offer complimentary access for our hotel guests.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 3
Description.Text: Discover hidden gems only a local would know with Renaissance's In-The-Know recommendations, personally curated weekly by our hotel's Navigator

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: Located directly across from the Washington Convention Center in the heart of downtown DC and DC City Center. The Renaissance Washington, DC Downtown Hotel is conveniently situated in the Penn Quarter district, between Capitol Hill and the White House.

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: Located directly across from the Washington Convention Center, Renaissance Washington, DC Downtown Hotel is ideal for experiencing the history and culture of the nation's capital. Our downtown Washington, DC hotel is conveniently situated in the Penn Quarter district, near DC City Center, Capitol Hill and the White House. Guests are close to shopping, the Verizon Center, the Spy Museum, Chinatown, National Portrait Gallery and world-famous National Mall monuments. Discover profound comfort in our luxury hotel in downtown Washington, DC - from plush, well-dressed beds and spacious desks to high-speed Internet. Look to our hotel to customize your next meeting - with 64,000 square feet of flexible meeting and event space, 36 meeting rooms, and premier planning services. Our newly renovated hotel offers five dining options, including a Starbucks Caf√©, an onsite spa and Vida fitness center. Uncover the best of DC with Renaissance Washington, DC Downtown Hotel, with the perfect balance of style and substance.

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: Located directly across from the Washington Convention Center and CityCenter DC in the heart of downtown DC. The Renaissance Washington, DC Downtown Hotel is conveniently situated in the Penn Quarter district, between Capitol Hill and the White House.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 1
Description.Text: Our renovated Washington, DC accommodations feature natural lighting and stunning city views.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 2
Description.Text: Each room features lavish bedding with deluxe mattresses and luxurious linens.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 3
Description.Text: Our downtown Washington, DC hotel accommodations are steps from shops and restaurants.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 4
Description.Text: We offer 13 spacious and finely appointed suites to celebrate special occasions.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 5
Description.Text: Our Club Level guest rooms feature special touches, enhanced services, and upgraded amenities.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 6
Description.Text: The Club Lounge serves continental breakfast, evening hors d'oeuvres and beverages all day.

Description.Text: Our hotel near the Verizon Center makes rooting for your favorite team or catching concerts a breeze

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: Find your inner Bonnie & Clyde at the Natl Museum of Crime & Punishment near our Penn Quarter hotel

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Enjoy a drink in the lobby just steps from the DC Convention Center, DC City Center and all that DC has to offer.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Our sports bar, featuring present and past President memorabilia, offers light fare and drinks. Grab a meal before or after an event at the Verizon Center or your next meeting. This restaurant in Downtown Washington, DC is steps away from DC City Center

Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Follow the signs to Washington D.C. (George Washington Parkway). Take the I-395/Route 1 north exit (which is the 14th St. bridge). Stay to the right and exit onto 12th St. Follow 12th St. to New York Ave and turn right. Turn right off of New York Ave onto 9th St. *** From the North: Take i-95 S to I-295 S. Towards 50 West, will turn into New York Avenue. Continue on New York Avenue and make a left onto 9th Street NW. The hotel is 2 blocks down on your left.

Transportation.Description: Drive Time to Airport

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Follow the signs to Dulles Airport Access Rd. Merge onto VA-267 E which becomes I-66 E. Take I-66 E to the Roosevelt Bridge, stay in the middle lane. Take the Constitution Ave exit off of the Roosevelt Bridge. Follow Constitution Ave until 12th Street and turn left. Continue on 12th Street and make a right turn on New York Ave. Proceed on New York Ave for two blocks and make a right turn on 9th Street. The hotel is on your immediate left

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Take the Baltimore-Washington Parkway South (MD 295) to US50 west (New York Ave.). Take New York Ave. at 5th St. Stay to the right and the street will become L St. Turn onto 9th St. The hotel is on the left. *** From I-95 S to I-295 S. Towards 50 West, will turn into New York Avenue. Continue on New York Avenue and make a left onto 9th Street NW. The hotel is 2 blocks down on your left.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Book Air + Hotel Together and Save!

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: When you book with Vacations by Marriott, your perfect vacation to our nation‚Äôs capital is just a click away. Enjoy fantastic savings by booking air & hotel packages. Vacations by Marriott is the only place you can book air + hotel and earn your Marriott Rewards points.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: We invite you to experience our newly renovated and PURE¬Æ Allergy-friendly guestrooms featuring plush bedding, custom duvets, Aveda¬Æ amenities plus additional features to ensure the ultimate in comfort and convenience. Learn more about our exciting renovations.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Up to 20% Off ‚Äì Book Your Holiday Season Stay

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Take advantage of a perfect location for the holiday season in DC. Stay at the Renaissance Washington, DC Hotel and get 15% off for two nights or 20% off for three nights. Don‚Äôt miss out!

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Here are some of our favorite things to eat, drink, see and do in DC, hand selected by our Marriott International associates and local navigators. We all know DC has fun things to do - let us help you discover something wonderfully new during your stay. Remember to LIVE LIFE TO DISCOVER.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Book Today and Save 25% Off Our Weekend Rates

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Save 25% off our weekend rates for a very limited time. Reservations must be booked between April 10 and 17 and can be made for any weekend between May 2 and September 2. Enjoy everything DC has to offer this spring or summer and save money at the same time! Use code: SPJ

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Our Spy Museum Package Is Intriguing

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Learn how real agents investigate with our International Spy Museum Package. It includes daily breakfast for 2 in Fifteen Squares Restaurant, 2 daily VIP International Spy Museum tickets, 2 daily passes to avoid waiting in the entry line, two 15 percent discount tickets for the museum retail store.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Spend Your Spring Break with Us and Save Big

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Spring Break Savings are available April 13- April 23. Accommodations only: Starting at $159. Accommodations & free valet parking: Starting at $179. Accommodations & free valet parking & breakfast for 2 adults and 2 children under 6: Starting at $199. Use code ADP. Some restrictions apply.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Book Today! Up to 20% Off! August Fun in DC!

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Stay longer and save in DC! Book an August trip to DC before summer ends. Explore the endless amount of attractions, dining, and entertainment hot spots our nation‚Äôs capital has to offer. Plan in advance a 3 or 4 night stay and receive up to 20% off your stay and complimentary Internet.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Book Today! Up to 20% Off! August Fun in DC!

TPA_Ext_eConfo.Title: Indulge in a Treatment at Our Onsite Spa

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Discover a Luxurious Spa Experience Without Having to Leave the Hotel

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: Renovated in 2010, the sun lit lobby is warm and cozy, designed for buiness and pleasure. Rich colors and decor accent the individual sitting areas, while unique art and lighting stimulate the senses. Free WiFi in the public areas.

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: The newly renovated Mount Vernon Square room provides 3,000 square feet of flexible meeting space. This room was formally the Auditorium, a 300 seat fixed tiered classroom set.

Description.Name: Group Description
Description.Text: Located directly across from the Washington Convention Center and the new City Center complex, the Renaissance Washington, DC Downtown Hotel is perfectly primed to help guests best experience the history and culture of the Nation's Capital. Relax and unwind in profound comfort in renovated guestrooms featuring every modern amenity. Trust our meeting planners to customize your next event in more than 64,000 square feet of event space. Savor five distinct dining options, including a Starbucks Caf√©. Relax and unwind at the onsite spa and Vida fitness center. Discover the ultimate location ‚Äì right in the heart of Penn Quarter, one of the city‚Äôs most vibrant destinations for business, dining and nightlife, as well as just minutes from prime sites like the Verizon Center, Chinatown, the National Portrait Gallery and the world-famous National Mall. At Renaissance Washington, DC Downtown, the best the city has to offer is right at your fingertips.

Description.Name: Sales strategy
Description.Text: Competitive Strenths: -Central location in trendy Penn Quarter, walking distance to Metro, Convention Center, Verizon Center, Spy Museum, National Portrait Gallery, Crime and Punishment Museum and 7th street restaurants, retail and recreation corridor.-38,000 square feet of contiguous meeting space on the BR Level featuring three ballrooms. Each with substantial prefuction area, permanent registration, lockable storage and dedicated office space. - Best rates and deal available Wednesday-Sunday and when congress is out of session. -Per Diem is welcome, food and beverage creativity is a speciality.- Mount Vernon Square, Penn Quarter and Congressional Ballroom are dedicated free sell space for the MARSO.- Vida Fitness Center is run by a professional fitness company and is the best hotel facility in DC. It is also COMPLIMENTARY for our guests.
